Steve,

Search for timestamp in the Ant stylesheets (located in Ant's etc 
=
folder). That is the place where the date/time is wtrittrn to your 
html do=
c.

Try to convert it to your timezone using the function fn:adjust-
dateTi=
me-to-timezone(datetime,timezone), documented on 
http://www.w3schools.com/=
xpath/xpath_functions.asp

Regards, Jan

B. Rainsberger" <jbrains762@...> 
wrote:

rently, when I run JUnit 4 tests using the XML formatter, it
